website_summaries.verdict: Handmade with all natural ingredients, this best-selling charcoal soap has 3 times the bars for the cost of just one of some other brands.
pros: Gentle enough to use as face soap as well as anywhere on the body
Tends to last longer than comparable bars
Acne, eczema, and psoriasis sufferers report seeing results almost immediately
Bamboo in soap is approved for organic use
Users love the way it smells
cons: Cost can be a bit too high for some consumers, even in a bundle of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. It works really well for me and doesn't cause breakouts and rashes like other soaps I have used. I have some form of dermatitis on my face and this soap calms it and helps. It also does really well at getting rid of odor in the armpits, which in all honesty most soaps arent fully able to for me. The only things I wish were better about it is the price for how small the bars are. 1 bar typically only lasts me about a month or so, and once you get over half way through the bar the soap gets really "gooey" and kind of sticky and turns into a glob.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly a miracle and I'm impressed. In less than a week, my daughters face is completely cleared. She has also battled eczema since birth and that is also getting better. I can't say it worked as fast on the eczema, but for acne it was a miracle. This is one product I've purchased on Amazon that is truly worth the 5 star rating! I will certainly buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly' Review

customer_reviews.title: Not all charcoal soaps are created equally...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the charcoal soap that Whole Foods sells... however I'm not driving an hour to go get it when I run out... so I thought I'd try some cheap charcoal soap from walmart... WRONG! My face HATED it and I broke out so bad... so I started my search on Amazon and came across this. I knew immediately when I felt it that it was good soap. A few days of using it now and my face is clearing back up! I'm so happy and would definitely suggest this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough but no miracle cure and WAY expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I do like the way my skin feels after using this and my Psoriasis seems to be less irritated. I'm comparing this to a Dove bar which is actually pretty harsh. I don't feel as dry after using these but still smooth.. I don't think I can justify the cost however at about $6.50 a bar and they only last a week if you're using them on your whole body. I'll just find some natural soap that is 1/2 the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Halstead

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the road.
customer_reviews.text: Ok soap, but I was hoping for more. Been on a kick lately of charcoal soaps to try and find the best one for my sensitive skin. Seems this one misses the mark. It lathers nicely and smells decent at best. A mix of tea tree and peppermint/mint. It's pretty strong, sometimes overbearing. It gets me clean, but seems to not help with my break outs which is way I use charcoal soaps. So far this one is the middle of the pack. The best one I've used is by Dr. Squatch, but they are mostly glycerin and don't last long. That and very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Surenuff'

customer_reviews.title: My favorite charcoal ever
customer_reviews.text: Charcoal soap and I go way back. For years I’ve used it from the drugstore. It had a very intense odor- like detergent and flowers. I finally got fed up and tried this one. I looked the ingredients including the peppermint, eucalyptus and rosemary. Those 3 happen to be my most used essential oils in my job as a massage therapist. This soap smells amazing, has great lather and does not dry my skin at all. The only flaw is the sharp corners that aren’t comfortable on the skin until they wear down a bit. Wish it was round or oval. Regardless, it’s fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: BinaryCode

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin? Forget it.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for two weeks, my acne got wose. This soap dried out my skin so much its about as bad as the free soap you get in a cheap hotel. This soap sticks to just about anything when you put it down and it leaves quite a lot of gray and black residue wherever you use/leave it. One bar lasted two weeks so $20 for a month and a half of soap... Kinda expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Bury

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this soap
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this soap. I'm also amazed at how much it lathers up. It does run the water washing away from you a little black/gray but rinses all away like it should. It smells so good too! Wish it wasn't so expensive so I could use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: JWHHC

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY IS GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was good nicely packaged with good quality box packaging tightly sealed. When opend the smell is very very strong. It smells like peppermint & eucalyptus very strong order. Its 4oz per soap. Wish the soap was bigger for the price paid. We bought this soap for my toddler with Aczema in high hopes to help her skin. I do not know if it works for her yet I will give an update, after a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Saul A. Gonzalez-Batres

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SOAP!!
customer_reviews.text: The greatest soap ever!! Not only does it help with acne, but so many skin conditions AND without drying delicate facial skin! Our family loves this soap and every soap we've used from Southern Naturals. Great company - great products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic soap for dry, itchy eczema prone skin.
customer_reviews.text: Relieved my dry, itchy skin with eczema in less than a week of use after months of trying to keep my flare ups at bay. I’ve finally found a great product that works for me! I’ll be a long time customer. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: now we all use it and my skin has never looked better and i'm pushing 50 years old
customer_reviews.text: cleared up by sons rash around his mouth in 2 days. after trying every possible essential oil, upping his probiotics, etc etc the next step was the dreaded doctor prescription. i stumbled upon this first after researching a little more about the ingredients, gave it a try and wah lah GONE. not only that, it cleared up his acne too. now we all use it and my skin has never looked better and i'm pushing 50 years old. ALSO an added bonus, it lasts a long time. I've had the same bars in my shower (away from running water) and one next to my sink for a few months. love that it doesn't just disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am in my 30’s and have just been through an IVF cycle which caused my already acne prone skin to breakout worse than it had in a very long time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for just over a week now, and to my amazement the soap noticeably calmed my acne breakout down. I am in my 30’s and have just been through an IVF cycle which caused my already acne prone skin to breakout worse than it had in a very long time. I was going to purchase an acne system, but after looking around I decided to give this one a try, after reading the good reviews. So far so good! Definitely give this one a try if you’re an adult woman with skin like mine!
customer_reviews.author: SweetlyByers

customer_reviews.title: Don't think I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using charcoal soaps for quite some time. This product has its pros and cons compared to what I have used. Pros: compared to other products it does moisturize the skin more and it has a good smell, where usually charcoal soaps are odorless. Cons: I have never used a soap that last me exactly 9 baths. I didn't even used a scrubber, yet it only lasts 9 baths. It is extremely small for such a great price. I usually get the Walmart brand which is half the price, double the size and the only difference is that the Walmart brand does not have a scent.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I'll update this review the longer I use this soap. After just a couple washes I've noticed a dramatic reduction in the redness from my psoriasis. It has a strong peppermint scent that doesn't linger after you wash and leaves my skin feeling clean and soft throughout the day. UPDATE: I've been using this now for two weeks, it's still helping with the redness, but not doing much for the flaking. That's not a big deal as I can just use a good lotion, still 5 stars because it's the only bar soap that doesn't irritate/inflame my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: This was iincredible !
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed using it I had a great time 's it may my shower so much better my body feel so deep clean ! ( I have got to reorder soon ) Thank !
customer_reviews.author: Max Tasby

customer_reviews.title: My husband has really dry skin specifically on his face ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has really dry skin specifically on his face. This soap cleans without stripping his sensitive skin. He’s used it for about 6 months now and we both see the difference. Will continue to order from this seller:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product broke my face out. I did not understand because it indicates it is for sensitive skin which should not have bdrn a problem however it WAS!!! I would NOT purchase this PRODUCT AGAIN!!!
customer_reviews.author: Metra Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: The price is a little high for something I can DIY, but I love the product. The minty smell and the way it made my body feel. Leaving my skin soft and moist. Although it didn't retain as much moisture for my dad.
customer_reviews.author: Mellazine

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: The product works very well (cleans, soothes, reduces inflammation). I have used it to wash my hair to calm down some psoriasis on my scalp and it has helped.
customer_reviews.author: R.H.N.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the soap not crazy about the scent but it smells like its supposed to. It works for my skin and my back has cleared up a little from red bumps. But not completely and i have used all of them now. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Eczema, Acne, Hyperpigmentation
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this soap for eczema, acne, hyperpigmentation on my face and underarm. Sept 10, 2019 mark 1 week of me using same and the I have seen tremendous result. After using soap on my face and body, I didn't have to hurry to lotion to lock in the moisture as the essential oils moisturized my skin. I further moisturize with the raw shea butter and blackseed oil. I will add a further review after 1 month. Thank you for the prompt delivery for my cousin to get the product ontime for travelling. My apology again for the late review but i was waiting on the other products to start my process. Thanks Southern
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived even faster than expected. Best Soap Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived even faster than expected. This soap has already helped begin to heal my eczema and it leaves my skin feeling so smooth. It has also cleared up my acne on my face as well. Highly recommend this product. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Loveera Delapena

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful soap for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Have suffered with eczema for years now on my right hand. One cousin suggested using charcoal soap, so I chose the one with mud from the dead Sea. It has worked wonders and has kept my hand clear from the burning blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Molli-B Morris

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite soap
customer_reviews.text: Before even opening the package i could smell the sweet aroma of the soap which got me even more excited to use it. Ive been using to soap for a week now and i dont plan on going back to "regular" soap again. My skin feels amazing, the soap lathers up super nice, i use it for face and body. And would definitely recommend to anyone looking to buy. Just do it you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful soap.
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple bars to start seeing results on my psoriasis but it is now drying up and going away. I will keep some on hand in case of another outbreak. Maybe if I start treating at the first sign it will clear up faster.
customer_reviews.author: BonBon

customer_reviews.title: I gave up Irish Spring for this.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would not be too fragrant for a guy. I actually loved this soap. Especially on my summer dry cracked feet. lathered up wonderfully. Skin felt great all day.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Impressed, will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I have had mild Eczema for as long as I can remember. When I ordered this bar of soap I was skeptical. I t has made my skin super soft and moisturized. The bar last a decent amount of time. Most specialty bars tend to go pretty quick. The bar has a strong medicated smell, but is not over powering. The one downside is that it is charcoal and tends to make the shower a little messier than usual. Would that stop me from using it, NO, I will definitely be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: DERICK BAXTER

customer_reviews.title: All natural and good skin moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my fingers used to get painful cracks around my nails. This soap seems to be doing a good job of alleviating that problem so far. Scent is nice and it lasts as long as other soaps. I also chose this product because it’s all natural. It’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: dain52

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect product if you share one of the three with ...
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to give a try and did not hold too much expectation. But it turned out working very well. After using it for about a week when I was traveling and could not carry my big bottle of facial cleanser with me, I feel my skin become more soft and smooth and more radiant. The only problem with me is three soaps feels gonna take me forever to finish using it. It's a perfect product if you share one of the three with your families or roommates.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: An extremely well-cleaning soap
customer_reviews.text: Really gets the grime off if you work outdoors and need a bath/shower. One thing: If you bathe and use this soap you will end up with a tough to remove black ring in your bathtub; use it in the shower only or be ready to scrub it off the tub with hot water. It is a very good, high quality soap bar. Rinse thoroughly!
customer_reviews.author: jerrybasham

customer_reviews.title: Day 1 new to you
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of using goat's milk based soaps and a fan of charcoal soaps too. I'm hoping this is a good fit for my skin. A lot of cleansers irritate my skin. I like the scent and glad it's not too strong. Some scent combos turn me off and can even give me headaches. The scent was refreshing as I washed my face this morning. Hopeful. Glad we can support small businesses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That is is good for sensitive acne prone skin:)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered your soap and another one to try for my daughter who has sensitive acne prone skin. The other one burned her skin so bad yours is lovely and so soothing👍🏻 So far she loves your soap and will be ordering more! Thank you for creating a nice bar of soap!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker!
customer_reviews.text: I have had acne on and off all throughout my teenage years. This summer it got worse than ever before so I decided to try the charcoal soap and it has worked better than anything I have tried. My skin cleared up significantly in just one week. I have been using it for a month now and only see an occasional bump every once in a while! LOVEEE THIS SOAP! It has a pleasant smell and doesn’t leave residue!
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love these soaps!! They last a lot longer than the stuff we used to use and my skin always feels squeaky clean not oily like with stuff we’ve used before. I like that they use natural ingredients and my husband would like to add that they smell real nice (sort of minty) 10/10 would buy again. We’ve used them for over a year now and are quite happy with the company and the products.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey Gates

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product has a mint fresh like scent & really leaves the skin energized & clean
customer_reviews.author: James J.

customer_reviews.title: 💘
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband . Recently he started seeing a dermatologist. The doctor told him to "yes use that". I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but can't say I love it
customer_reviews.text: After using this for over a week I noticed it was drying my skin out. Not that big of a deal but that removed two stars for me. Value is okay and so is scent. Not bad but can't say I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, however, I feel that the price was too high for how small the bars are and you're only getting 3.
customer_reviews.author: Visa

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Exotic! I liked the soap..very minty smell. Supposed to have some neat properties! Was even more happy I bought it after watching the YouTube video of where it's made. Good stuff
customer_reviews.author: RyanT

customer_reviews.title: I have terrible scarring from bug bites and eczema on my legs ...
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible scarring from bug bites and eczema on my legs as well as mild acne on my face. This soap has not only given me marked and significant improvement on my legs, but also has made the skin on my face a whole lot better! If you have sensitive or problematic skin, you should really give this stuff a try.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth decarlo

customer_reviews.title: He said it works really good. I have since reordered 2 more for him
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my elderly father who has eczema. He said it works really good. I have since reordered 2 more for him. Highly recommend for itchy, flakely, skin.
customer_reviews.author: Londia J. Gray

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this soap for acne. Man does it work! And it doesn’t dry your face out!
customer_reviews.author: Jean M Capobianco

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I waited a week to leave this review, i have psoriasis on my arm and leg area which i hate, i couldn't even wear sleeveless top because of this. After using this soap about a week, it slowly started disappearing I literally used 20 different product on my psoriasis none of them was effective as this soap. Love this product
customer_reviews.author: Purevsuren

customer_reviews.title: Now his face is better, his acne is almost gone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my son who have problem with acne. Now his face is better, his acne is almost gone. Love this product! I will recommend thus product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely hard water at home and this soap cleans like no other soap I've tried. It cleans your skin squeaky clean and doesn't dry you out at all...sounds simple, but every other soap I've ever used doesn't work this way. I even use it on my face every day. I can't live without this soap!
customer_reviews.author: TexasJay

customer_reviews.title: Moderate Psoriasis MUCH better!
customer_reviews.text: I have moderate psoriasis (it covers half my body) and after 2 weeks of using this soap, my itching and flaking has reduced tremendously. I was going to start to have to take a biological pill but I’ve seen so much improvement I might not take it! I don’t leave reviews often but if you have psoriasis, please try this. It helps!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and helps with plaque psoriasis.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has psoriasis and due to having had cancer treatment, he can no longer take some of his prescribed psoriasis medications. This soap has a fresh, clean scent and seems to be controlling the psoriasis plaques pretty well. I've already reordered several more bars.
customer_reviews.author: SandyB

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: Lovely soap. My skin is not troublesome, so I'm just using it as a facial cleaner. Feels soft and creamy when wet, and the smell is pleasant. Nicely packaged; would make a good gift. Also, the price is much more reasonable than many soaps with activated charcoal, some of which are this price for a single bar.
customer_reviews.author: carb101

customer_reviews.title: Drys skin and doesn’t clean up skin well. Old white lady soap.
customer_reviews.text: The product is alright. It doesn’t really cut the deodorant effect I need to cut bad smells from working out or work. I’m using it but it’s better for those who don’t work jobs in labor or don’t have bad body odor. Kind of disappointed of the fragrance result. Just looking for something other than dove to dry out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy dog lady

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Happy skin.
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. I've always had issues with me skin and after only a week I'm seeing improvements. If you have skins issues give it a try. You'll be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soap smells great and has so far prevented any skin blemishes. Impressed and happy with soap.
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Soap is very drying.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of use I can say this soap is very drying. My skin feels like rough leather, as does my daughter's who has ezcema. My psoriasis is more red, itching and cracking more than it ever has. Her ezcema is more inflamed after using this soap. Our routine is use this soap, put on coconut oil, then treat my psoriasis and her ezcema and even after that our skin is still very dry. I will try for 1 more week as I know charcoal brings all the impurities to the surface of your skin. I had big hopes for this soap. Maybe it will prove me wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Rennee M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Psoriasis!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Definitely helped with the dryness and redness of psoriasis! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: PrincessLea

customer_reviews.title: Great soap and service
customer_reviews.text: Leaves your skin feeling very smooth and deeply moisturized. Efficacy for skin condition - still measuring. Though immediately noticeable there is no itching and the dry areas appears lighter. Great soap and service! Thank you. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: STWAH

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, but not for people with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product thinking that it would be beneficial for my psoriasis, but it did not help at all. The product smells great and has a pleasant peppermint scent. However, it STINGS when used on sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great soap! Very messy
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and really has really helped my eczema so far. It's not really an issue for me, but the charcoal is potent! Blackens your whole shower after using. But hey, it's easy to rinse off.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: This soap is not soapy. no matter how much ...
customer_reviews.text: This soap is not soapy. no matter how much I rub this soap it will not come out soapy. Not a big fan of it.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for one week and it has helped tame a rash I have on my torso. It has also helped with the itchiness from dry skin. Still trying to get used to the fact that the lather is black but as long as it washes away - guess that's okay!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: Good for eczema
customer_reviews.text: Due to the softness of the bar, I recommend that you do not keep it in your shower when not in use or at least purchase a case to keep it in. My son and husband have eczema and love the soap.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Carricato

customer_reviews.title: Great great product. Good ingredients. The smell is strong.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My face almost felt like after a facial! It was clean and soft and not dry! And the next morning my skin was so smooth! The only thing I don’t like is the strong smell. It’s not a bad smell It’s just so strong from the peppermint and eucalyptus oils.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps my spouse itchy skin from the chlorinated city water.
customer_reviews.author: C. Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don't like
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as well as I thought it would
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap - It helps my eczema on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: azfuelboy

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Trust me it works! My skin was rough, oily, and just ugly. I use this and instantly after I showered I seen and felt the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Jr

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic soap!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. skin feels soft and moisturized, unlike other soaps that leave you feeling tight and dry. Smells great too. Glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyOne

customer_reviews.title: The psoriasis benefits of the charcoal bars.
customer_reviews.text: I use the charcoal soap because I have psoriasis all over my body. My husband uses the moisturizing soap. He has dry skin and he always uses it. Thank you! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality ingredients that work well on many different skin issues.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the Charcoal part I'm but not so crazy about the scent.

customer_reviews.title: All natural product
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely enjoy your product. Makes the skin smooth and clean feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Parlin Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. I was having a lot of sensitivity issues on my face, and dry skin on my body. This worked for both issues. I have my son using it now, too.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Did not know what to expect with this soap. But was pleasantly surprised. Great product, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter and I both like this soap. She says it really helps with acne on her face. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that it's a little more pricey than what I'm used to spending on soap.
customer_reviews.author: Nemo

customer_reviews.title: Great for eczema
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with dry and eczema prone skin in the wintertime. This soap calmed my these issues. Will purchase again!

customer_reviews.title: Soap bars
customer_reviews.text: Great soap. Not the commercial mass produced garbage out there ... very clean and refreshing... no itching like Dove soaps, no comparison.

customer_reviews.title: Please buy !
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing soap ever for psoriasis! And I have the worst kind.

customer_reviews.title: This  soap is  pure  heaven , skin feels  and  looks  clean
customer_reviews.text: The soap is pure heaven and I noticed the whole family loves the smell, our skin looks and feels cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Like the smell of soap. I purshased to help with psoriasis hasnt cleared but alot less itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Review

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy the soap. I do find if I use it more than a few times a week on my sensitive face I get red and irritated around the thinnest parts, like my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Fontana

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Wrong product arrived. Ordered charcoal soap but got goats milk soap. Ugh

customer_reviews.title: ... soap for about a week and so far I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this soap for about a week and so far I love it!! I honestly feel a difference already!!! I have dry skin and acne .
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Best slope i have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This soap made my ecezma get better after 5 days using can see it working. And my skin feels very clean and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: I can honestly say that every time I feel the ...
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say that every time I feel the pain of a pimple surfacing on my face, as soon as I wash my face with this soap consistently (morning and night), it stops the pimple from growing right on its tracks and makes it go away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful company!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived very well packaged. The soap smells so good and is perfect for my twins who have eczema.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing soap cleansing bar.
customer_reviews.text: This soap smells so refreshing, has a great fragrance to it. Leaves your son feeling soft and clean. Ordered more yesterday, what a great find. Well worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: I am already seeing redness relief in under a week. I really love this product. I do use aloe vera a few nights a week at night due to comments of drying out but I am not having any issue. I have rosacea and subera dermatitis

customer_reviews.title: I already liked using a charcoal soap for my face
customer_reviews.text: I already liked using a charcoal soap for my face. I wanted to try this because it also has dead sea mud. So far I'm loving it, and it smells really nice. :)

product_meta.title: Activated Charcoal Soap Bar (3 PACK) With Dead Sea Mud - For Dry Sensitive Skin. All Natural Face Soap & Body Soap. Made With Goat's Milk & Peppermint Essential Oil. For Men, Women & Teens. (4 oz EACH)
product_meta.description:
Size:3 BARSSouthern Natural Dead Sea Mud & Activated Charcoal Black Soap is made with goat’s milk and all natural ingredients that your skin will love!

Satisfaction Guaranteed! We’ve been making soap for over 9 years and we have many customers who tell us that our handmade soap is the best! We are so confident you’ll love our soap, that we offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee.

Southern Natural soaps are handmade using the cold process method. Our bars then cure for 6-8 weeks resulting in a harder, longer lasting bar of soap.

Benefits: Our soap is great for all skin types and has helped many of our customers with dry cracked fingers and dry sensitive skin. Many of our customers report that their skin feels clean and soft when using our soap.

Key Ingredients:

Dead Sea Mud - Improves skin health due to it’s high levels of natural minerals.

Activated Charcoal - Is a natural detoxifier

Natural Oils - Made with olive, coconut & palm oils to create a very moisturizing bar of soap.

Goat Milk - Contains natural fats, which add to the moisturizing properties of our soap. It also has many proteins, vitamins and minerals that are good for your skin.

Peppermint, Rosemary & Eucalyptus Essential Oils- Make your skin feel clean and fresh.

Common uses:

Use as a shaving soap, face soap, hand soap or body soap. You’ll love how well our soap cleans your skin without leaving it tight and dry.

Great for men, women, children and teens.

Each bar weighs apprx. 4 oz
feature_bullets: DO YOU HAVE DRY SENSITIVE SKIN? GIVE THIS HANDMADE SOAP A TRY! Many of our customers have reported that our natural soap cleans well without leaving their skin dry and itchy.
MADE WITH ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS - including, Dead Sea Mineral Mud, Activated Charcoal, Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sustainable Palm Oil, Goat’s Milk & Peppermint, Rosemary & Eucalyptus Essential Oils.
GENTLE & NATURALLY DETOXIFYING - Use as a FACE SOAP, BODY WASH or HAND SOAP.
LONG LASTING BARS THAT GIVE GREAT LATHER - Our customers tell us that our bar soap is longer lasting compared to commercial bars and other natural soaps.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED! MADE IN USA. Add to cart and support small business.
